name: Cargo Transporter - Road Truck Cargo Delivery and Parking
name_original: Cargo Transporter - Road Truck Cargo Delivery and Parking
description:
Transport the cargo in time using your driving skills

Use your driving skills to transport the cargo from the mountains site in to the city on time without losing any cargo or damaging it before the time ran out. Drive carefully in the uneven mountain terrain and in the traffic of the city, avoid the hurdles in the path and successfully transport the cargo at the destination point.

A real 3D truck simulation game with smooth and easy controls with 2 environments of the city and the mountains, multiple mission with increase difficulties. Can you deliver the cargo on time using your driving skills ?

Game Feature:

- Multiple missions
- Easy controls
- Beautiful graphics and gameplay music
- Smooth game play and 2 environments
- Much more….

Like the game share with others, let us know your thoughts, all the feedback and positive criticism will be appreciated.
